CustomField.description: It represents the behavior we want to encourage. It is a record which belongs to either a Salesforce standard or custom object set in the Action. You can choose the main object or any of its related lists for a whole master-detail process, that is, to process several records as a whole (e.g. Invoice> Invoice Details).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Choose the object from Action which represents the behavior you want to encourage. It can be the main object or any of its related lists for a whole master-detail process.
CustomField.label: Target Object
